title: Instant PotÂ® black bean, quinoa and vegetable bake
ingredients: ['150g dry black beans', '1L water', '350g quinoa', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 red onion, diced', '1 red pepper, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pinch cumin', '250g sweetcorn', '25g chopped fresh coriander, divided', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '275g grated cheese, divided', '180g spicy green salsa, or more to taste', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '180ml hot water', '2 scallions, thinly sliced']
